subject: Add new api for system event handling from tizen_2.3
commitMessage:
Add new api for system event handling from tizen_2.3

Remove system event callbacks except related application lifecycle.
The system event callbacks can be registered using ui_app_add_event_handler().
Multiple system event callbacks can be registered.
The application main loop api is renamed to ui_app_main.

app_event_get_xxx provides apis for getting system event information.

Change-Id: Ib24f8bb46038fc6a4b50c2516e846cfc27e7acfd
Signed-off-by: Jiwoong Im <jiwoong.im@samsung.com>

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

Plz set a real title in your commit message, not a bug id.
For example :
"make app_get_appinfo() function concern current user"

And:
Bug-Tizen: TC-1574

And:
a sign-off line ?

subject: Adding the new service operation 'SERVICE_DATA_AUTOMATICALLY'.
commitMessage:
Adding the new service operation 'SERVICE_DATA_AUTOMATICALLY'.

This key is to be used to inform the launched service to do the things
automatically, with no user prompt/UI. For example, some application
may use it to send an email/sms without the need to deal with any
view/ug.

Change-Id: I17e5556453bb92965fccedbe6ca114cc2b716df7
Signed-off-by: Gustavo Lima Chaves <gustavo.lima.chaves@intel.com>
